title: What is the main DC Universe? - Quora

response.answer_text: Earth Prime is the main DC Universe; which is our universe. However, that was only until the concept of Multiverse became known to all the characters. Thereon, all the other Universes were considered parellels to Earth Prime, and to distinguish them, they were numbered. And because our universe is the main established universe, and the base of all the original characters and their comic titles, it was given primary status. Effectively, Earth Prime came to be known as Earth 1, as the other earths essentially are canonically insprired from our universe, and not the other way around.
In the DC Universe, there is the Multiverse. There are 52 Earths within the Multiverse. Earth 0, also known as Earth Prime is the Earth that is the center and focus of DC comics.
